feed.title: Hugo’s blog
feed.subtitle: Young French developer's blog. I'll write about my experiences in web development

entry.title: I started my blog
entry.content:
Why did I create a blog?

After creating my portfolio, I figured that I might use a blog to post in order to share interesting technologies, methods or any discover related with development that I might do. So I’ll probably be posting about things I’ll see in class or learn when I’m doing personnal projects.

You can probably expect a little article about Symfony soon as we have a really small project to do in class. While waiting for this you can check my github or my portfolio!

Thanks for reading this, and come back next week if you’re interested !
entry.summary: Why did I create a blog? After creating my portfolio, I figured that I might use a blog to post in order to share interesting technologies, methods or any discover related with development that I might do. So I’ll probably be posting about things I’ll see in class or learn when I’m doing personnal projects.
